subject: Genericize service_category enum
description: Updated service_category enum from trades-specific `[\"plumbing\",\"hvac\",\"electrical\",\"appliance\",\"general\"]` to generic service types `[\"repair\",\"installation\",\"maintenance\",\"consultation\",\"emergency\",\"support\",\"sales\",\"billing\",\"general\"]`.
